translations: n.联盟，同盟；盟国（alliance 的复数形式）；联姻

phrs.translation: 战略联盟（两家公司的合作安排，两者决定分享资源，互补长短）；策略联盟
星空联盟（全球最大的航空联盟）

sentences.sentence: Strategic alliances are being forged with major European companies.
sentences.translation: 正与欧洲主要公司设法结成战略同盟。

sentences.sentence: After that the two alliances might be subsumed into a new European security system.
sentences.translation: 之后两个联盟可能会被归入新的欧洲保安系统中。

sentences.sentence: One way to lower costs will be to forge alliances with foreign companies or to expand internationally through appropriate takeovers – in short, to "globalize."
sentences.translation: 降低成本的途径之一将是与外国公司结成联盟或通过适当的兼并进行国际性扩张–简言之，就是“全球化”。
